alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg; Jim Wells; La Salle; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 22 at 1:48AM CST until December 23 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. * WHERE...La Salle, McMullen, Webb, Duval, Jim Wells and Inland Kleberg Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Subsequent freeze warnings will likely be needed each night through the weekend.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Inland Kleberg; Jim Wells; La Salle; McMullen; Webb
